div.p: Latitudinal and global distribution of modern and LIG reef coral occurrences. ( a,b) Frequency of occurrence records (Occ), species diversity (SIB) and shared species (species present in both time slices (sSIB)) of reef corals binned at 5° latitudinal zones. ( c) World distribution map of shared species (subsampled at 1.25° × 1.25° and clipped to environmental data) between the modern and the LIG. Grey shaded area represents the extent of the tropics in the present day. Dashed lines indicate the Equator, the Northern Tropic and the Southern Tropic.
